success.title: Success
success.description: Boolean flag indicating if the follow was successful

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Explanation if action failed or was skipped

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: ISO timestamp of when the action was performed

runDate.title: Run Date
runDate.description: ISO timestamp of the entire run

accountType.title: Account Type
accountType.description: Account type used in this run
